name: That Tracks
description:
WASD to move.
Space to swap between mech and plane.

Mech mode:
L-Click to fire,
R to reload.

Plane mode:
L-Click to place tracks,
R-Click to place turrets.

Goal: Collect resources to continue the tracks on the left and connecting them to the ones on the right.

This is both of our first game jam, first released game and first time working together. We had a lot of lessons learned and plan to update the game to polish the game play and implement the features we didn't get to during the jam.

The enemy bases aren't fully implemented because we ran out of time, they currently spawn 1-5 enemies every 30 seconds and are indestructible.
